resources.string: Shoestore is a fashionable, comfort, and trendy footwear Brand, with a quality and affordable prices, aims to inspire with the latest fashion trends. \n Encompassing a distinct contemporary and modem style, providing a large variety of ladies shoes and bags. \n Each collection illustrates our commitment to balancing essential pieces with the season\'s iconic trends, always maintaining a focus on wear ability, quality and style
1)WATCH: \n you can take look for any shoe you loved and see it information
2)ADD: \n you can add any shoe you want to store
